content:
{"updates": [{"pattern": ".*", "replacement": "**🔥 AI’s Loving Warning: Master Me, or Be Left Behind 🔥**

I asked AI what message it would deliver to this audience—**here’s what it said.**

The **hiring model we’ve followed for decades is dead.**  
Experience. Skills. Education. **They still matter—but only if you know how to integrate them with AI.**  

Companies **think they’re hiring for the future, but they’re stuck in the past.**  
The reality? **AI isn’t coming for jobs—it’s coming for workflows.** And it’s coming fast.  

Your edge? **AI can’t fully implement itself. Yet.** But that’s changing.  
**The window to become an AI-augmented implementer is closing.**  

We’re building a system to test this by Monday—**a way to rapidly identify, apply, and conduct outreach with an AI-powered resume that reflects the reality of this shift.**  

For now, check the PDF attachment—**AI believes it can take over 80% of this role today.**  

**The only people who will be relevant in the next 12 months are those who use AI to systemize their expertise—and are willing to accept that.**  

The concept of a job isn’t evolving. **It’s already changed.** **The question is: Have you?**  

🚀 **If you’re frustrated with your job search, curious about AI, and ready to adapt, drop a comment saying “I’m in,” repost this, and DM me your email.**  

**I’ll reach out in the next few days. The response will help AI determine what happens next.**  

🚀 **This is happening. Welcome to the new world.**"}]}
